title: BEACON: A Unified Behavioral-Tactical Framework for Explainable Cybercrime Analysis with Large Language Models
summary: Cybercrime increasingly exploits human cognitive biases in addition to technical vulnerabilities, yet most existing analytical frameworks focus primarily on operational aspects and overlook psychological manipulation.
